ygData.subject: RE: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I spent a little time fighting gargoyles in the OOT a few levels ago... they re just about at level 20-22 or so.  About every 5 or 6 gargoyles, they drop a
ygData.messageBody:
I spent a little time fighting gargoyles in the OOT a few levels ago...
they're just about at level 20-22 or so. About every 5 or 6 gargoyles,
they drop a gargoyle eye or two, worth almost 10pp with good charisma.

..................................Selianth Jongleure
..Bard of the 23rd song
..Cazic-Thule server


Beth Frantz "The musician's art is to send light
beth@... into the depths of men's hearts"
--Robert Schumann

On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, James Schuldes wrote:

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Welcome!
>
> I think you got your GZ answer? You read the response we got from him on
> som ebard questions - his sig was at the bottom.
>
> The gargoyles are found in the Ocean of Tears (take the boat from Freeport
> and it sails through OOT). I do not have first hand experience with them
> but a monk friend had been to visit them and he is about 20ish. He trained
> the giant skels to the Gargs and feigned i guess. Then let the Garg and
> Skel duke it out. Then he recoved and killed the weakened Garg. Not sure
> you could handle them at level 12 - i got the feeling they were higher level
> but really dont know.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 35th Song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
